name.baseName: Cassava-based ethylene production ; Ethylene ; Ethanol dehydration ; Cassava
基于木薯乙烯生产 ; 乙烯 ; 乙醇脱水 ; 木薯

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Two alternative ethanol production scenarios, corn-based and cassava-based, were tested for ethylene production.
本研究对两种替代乙醇生产方案（基于玉米秸秆和基于木薯）的乙烯生产进行了评估。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 tonne of ethylene production.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Data related to the operation process (e.g., electricity, steam, water, chemicals, raw material consumption, and direct emissions) from the cassava-based ethanol and corn-based ethylene production plants in the Guangxi and Anhui Provinces in China were used [20], [21].
相关生产数据（例如电力、蒸汽、水、化学品、原材料消耗和直接排放）来源于中国安徽省木薯乙醇生产工厂。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Processes included in present study are summarized as follows:1) Corn and cassava production at farm; 2) Ethanol and ethylene production; 3) Machinery drying;4) Road transport;5) Waste treatment; 6) Material and coal based energy production;7) Energy recovery on site.
本研究包括的过程总结如下：1）木薯生产；2）乙醇和乙烯生产；3）原料干燥；4）公路运输；5）废物处理；6) 材料和煤炭能源生产；7）生产能源回收。
technology.technologicalApplicability: Cassava-based ethylene is primarily utilized as a feedstock for the production of various plastics, elastomers, and other organic chemical products. This renewable feedstock option is particularly relevant for industries seeking sustainable solutions to replace petroleum-derived ethylene, catering especially to markets with a high demand for 'green' chemical products.
基于木薯的乙烯主要用作生产各种塑料、弹性体和其他有机化学产品的原料。这种可再生原料选择对于寻求可持续解决方案以替代石油衍生的乙烯的行业特别相关，尤其适用于对'绿色'化工产品需求高的市场。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Co-product allocation based on product mass was performed.
进行了基于产品质量的联产品分配。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Data related to the operation process (e.g., electricity, steam, water, chemicals, raw material consumption, and direct emissions) from the cassava-based ethanol and corn-based ethylene production plants in the Guangxi and Anhui Provinces in China were used.2. Corn-based ethanol, with an annual production capacity of 370 kt in 2010, accounted for approximately 20% of the total biomass-based ethanol production, whereas cassava-based ethanol, with an annual total capacity of 20 kt, is currently the only non-grain-based ethanol production enterprise.3. The data related to corn and cassava production at farms, coal-based electricity generation, and road transport processes were taken from the references.4. Moreover, data on chemical production and relevant background data from Europe were used [26] because of the lack of information for China.
相关生产数据（例如电力、蒸汽、水、化学品、原材料消耗和直接排放）来源于中国安徽省木薯乙醇生产工厂。2. 玉米秸秆生产、燃煤发电和公路运输过程的相关数据取自参考文献。3. 由于缺乏中国的信息，因此使用了欧洲的化学品生产数据和相关背景数据[26]。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Hong, J., Zhang, Y., Xu, X. & Li, X. Life cycle assessment of corn- and cassava-based ethylene production. Biomass and Bioenergy 67, 304–311 (2014).
Hong, J., Zhang, Y., Xu, X. & Li, X. Life cycle assessment of corn- and cassava-based ethylene production. Biomass and Bioenergy 67, 304–311 (2014).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this LCA data set, ensure correct allocation methods for co-products are applied, as the dataset involves proportional distribution based on mass. Pay attention to regional specificity, since data for the cassava-based and corn-based ethylene production processes are derived from Chinese facilities and may differ from data in other regions. In cases where Chinese data were not available, European data were used as proxy; adjust your assessments accordingly if more localized data become available. Use this LCA data for modeling the environmental impacts of ethylene production, ensuring proper consideration of factors such as energy usage, transportation, waste treatment, and direct emissions.
在使用这个生命周期评估数据集时，请确保正确应用了联产品的分配方法，因为该数据集涉及基于质量的比例分配。注意区域特性，因为基于木薯和基于玉米的乙烯生产流程数据来自中国的设施，可能与其他区域的数据不同。在缺乏中国数据的情况下，使用了欧洲数据作为代理；如果有更本地化的数据变得可用，相应调整您的评估。使用这些LCA数据来模拟乙烯生产的环境影响，确保适当考虑能源使用、运输、废物处理和直接排放等因素。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
